events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong item that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. It should appear within 5-7 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help with this refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Please let us know how we did with resolving your refund issue.
